title: The Way I see it
creator_credit: Roundtable Productions, Leon S. Gold and Jack Denove
brief_description: A case study which explores the effect of perceptual differences on supervisor-subordinate relations and on job performance. Looking critically and objectively at both sides the roots of the differences are seen as perceptual. The problem is not resolved.
